  • Constructor Details

    • Issue

      public Issue(int id, Issue.IssueType issueType, String summary, String note)
      Constructs a Issue from the provided IssueType, summary, and note. If any parameter is null or string is empty or id less than 1, IllegalArgumentException is thrown
      Parameters:
      id - the id of issue
      issueType - the type of issue
      summary - the summary
      note - the note
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameter is invalid

    • Issue

      public Issue(int id, String state, String issueType, String summary, String owner, boolean confirmed, String resolution, ArrayList<String> notes)
      Construct a Issue from all fields. If any parameter is null or string is empty or id less than 1, IllegalArgumentException is thrown
      Parameters:
      id - the id of issue
      state - the state of issue
      issueType - the type of issue
      summary - the summary
      owner - the owner
      confirmed - confirmed status
      resolution - the resolution
      notes - the notes
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameter is invalid
